oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mono-, di- and tri-nuclear Ni(II) complexes of N-, O-donor ligands: structural diversity and reactivity
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DEY, MISHTU
RAO, CHEBROLU P
SAARENKETO, PAULI K
KARI RISSANEN
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: mono-, di- and tri-nuclear ni(ii) complexes
urea adduct
pyridine bound mononuclear ni(ii) complex
n-, o-donor molecules
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A series of mono-, di- and tri-nuclear Ni(II) complexes of N, O-donating molecules possessing ---H2C---NH--- and ---HC=N--- moieties have been synthesized and characterized and the structures have been determined by single crystal X-ray diffraction. All these exhibited interesting molecular packing in their crystal lattices. Di-nuclear complexes were found to be cleaved in pyridine to result in mononuclear ones with additional coordinations being provided by pyridine. Di-nuclear complexes were found to form urea adducts as demonstrated based on absorption and vibrational studies.
